catalog_info.title: Methods in the History of the Book: Seminar
catalog_info.notes: This course is also offered through the English Department as English 259. Credit may be earned for either History 2321 or English 259, but not both.
catalog_info.description: Introduction to methods and debates in book history and in the history and theory of reading.  Students working on any time period and any national literature are welcome; the seminar will incorporate a research project that may feed into a dissertation topic.
